title: QSS doesn't work on malph ult?
body:
So I just played a game with an enemy malph who liked to ult me on sight. I had a fully built mercurial and used it mid-air **after** he ulted me yet, I still floated in the air for that half-of-a-second during his ult.

Being knocked airborne is CC soooo...why can't I cancel it with mercurial when it's supposed to remove **all** cc effects? Maybe I'm missing something?

PS.
I made sure to use mercurial **after** his ult landed and cc was applied.

replies.body: Doesn't work on any knock ups as far as I'm aware
It has never worked on knock-ups or knock-backs.

Wow, I didn't know it didn't work on airborne CC. That's dumb.

Thanks for the clarification.
It used to work on them, then it got nerfed. It oddly  used to cancel half the crowd control, you still got knocked up but could move.
